name: Soul Dash (F2022 Team 4)
description:
Description:

Chosen by a hero's sword, a small elf must take on the mantle of protecting her village. She must learn the secret powers of her sword in a fast-paced dash & slash adventure. Embark on an journey across the land to find the source of the plight and to put an end to the evil forces once and for all.

Controls:

Action

Mouse/Keyboard

Move left

A

Move right

D

Fast fall (in air)

S

Jump

Spacebar / W

Dash

Right Mouse Button

Attack

Left Mouse Button

Aim(attacks and dashes)

Mouse Movement

Zoom Out CameraLeft Shift / Tab

Special Dashes:
